page.title: 08PILSGATE
page.content: Pilsgate is a very small village. It has an old estate and a new estate. The new estate is one half of Pilsgate. The old part is called Puddingbag lane.Across the main road is a large farm house "Pilsgate farm" belonging to Mr.Reynolds.He farms much of the surrounding land. On the junction is a bus stop and a telephone kiosk. Behind this is a large grain store. Puddingbag lane has nine houses and two bungalows.The two bungalows are for disabled people. They have an alarm light over the window in case there is an emergency. The one I live in belongs to Burghley and is probably less than twenty years old.At the bottom there is a dead end and you can see most of Barnack across a steeply sloping hill.
